Name: Book 6

text:
Smashwords Benefits

Readers

  • Over 80,000 ebooks priced at FREE.
Name: Book 6

text:
• Over 510,000 low-cost multi-format ebooks from the world's best indie authors
  • All books are DRM-free because Smashwords and our authors trust you
  • Directly support over 140,000 indie authors who earn the highest royalties (up to 80% list price) from the Smashwords Store
  • Thousands of new books to discover each month
  • Smashwords library - permanent access to purchased books
  • Dropbox integration
  • Email delivery option for purchased books

    • Authors & Publishers

    • Simplicity - We make ebook publishing fast, free and easy.
Name: Book 6

text:
• Reach more readers - Global distribution to multiple ebook retailers and libraries
  • Earn more - Earn 60-80% list as your royalty
  • Save time - Consolidated Smashwords distribution helps you spend more time writing and less time managing multiple upload platforms
  • Reputation - Smashwords is the world's largest and most trusted indie ebook distributor.
Name: Book 6

text: Join over 140,000            authors and small independent presses that publish and distribute with Smashwords.
Name: Book 6

text:
FREE professional publishing tools

  • Daily sales reports
  • Consolidated sales reporting and tax accounting
  • Centralized metadata management
  • Preorder distribution
  • Author profile page
  • FREE ISBNs
  • FREE ebook conversion from Word.
Name: Book 6
